body_html: For backwards compatibility reasons, we can't change bidirectional_rnn. However we have an open PR implementing dynamic bidirectional rnn, and we can change the signature there to emit the final states.
body_text: For backwards compatibility reasons, we can't change bidirectional_rnn.  However we have an open PR implementing dynamic bidirectional rnn, and we can change the signature there to emit the final states.
body: For backwards compatibility reasons, we can't change bidirectional_rnn.  However we have an open PR implementing dynamic bidirectional rnn, and we can change the signature there to emit the final states.
